meanings.sent1: The culexes were buzzing around the picnic area.
meanings.sent2: I saw many culexes near the pond.
meanings.sent3: The culexes seemed to be having a party in the garden.

meanings.sent5: The annoying culexes made it hard to enjoy the outdoors.

meanings.sent5: The culexes population increased after the rain.
